item.title: Customize Your AI Coder: A Deep Dive into Claude Code Output Styles
item.description: Learn to use Claude Code's new Output Styles feature to transform your AI assistant. This guide covers everything from using preset personas like 'Explanatory' and 'Learning' to creating your own custom AI styles for tasks like code auditing, TDD, and more.
